newsitem.title: UK: Oxford Molecular to take stake in Cambridge.
newsitem.headline: Oxford Molecular to take stake in Cambridge.

text.p: Britain's Oxford Molecular Group Plc said it would make an initial cash investment of 0.5 million stg in drug research firm Cambridge Combinatorial.
Oxford would take a stake of 20 percent in the issued ordinary share capital of Cambridge.
Cambridge Combinatorial would also have to offer three further tranches of deferred shares, equivalent to 0.5 million stg, to Oxford Molecular.
Oxford Molecular said the investment was a strategic move to providing a range of integrated drug design services to its pharmaceutical services.
